text: usane to tumapar keval murdaar, rakt, suar ka maans aur jisapar allaah ke siva kisee aur ka naam liya gaya ho, haraam thaharaaya hai. phir yadi koee is prakaar vivash ho jae ki na to usakee lalak ho aur na vah had se aage badhanevaala ho to nishchay hee allaah bada kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
